# {{lb|zh|historical}} a rank equivalent to [[marquis]]

====Usage notes====
* In the [[w:Han Dynasty|Han Dynasty]], this noble rank was awarded to government officials who were not related to the imperial family. The title was supposedly awarded in recognition of one's meritorious service.
